name: Crowne Plaza Hotel Maruma Hotel & Casino

reviews.text: Well, I see the last review posted on this hotel is mine :) As much as I didn't like the hotel last time, I didn't have much of a choice - it's literally the only place to stay in Maracaibo on short notice with half decent prices.
reviews.title: Much better this time

likes.liked: — There seems to be WiFi in most rooms
likes.disliked: — The WiFi doesn't work half the time

reviews.text: Surprise, surprise, this time I got one of the renovated rooms. It was a million times better than last time. I was about to rate it higher, however the few roaches I saw in my bathroom made me change my mind.
reviews.title: TERRIBLE PLACE, TERRIBLE SERVICES, RUDE FRONT DESK

reviews.text: For a list of bad things in this hotel, read my previous review.
reviews.title: Rooms do not look similar to Web Site!
Not Good
reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for four nights. The first night I arrived I requested upon entering the room a change of room. The room smelled like mold, had water filtration on the wall from the bathroom, the AC was not working properly. The other 3 rooms they showed me were in the same or worst condition, and the only solution offered was to transfer me to a room that will cost me $300 + a night.

I liked the lobby. That was a good start. But when I checked into my room, I found that I couldn't get the promised wireless Internet signal. After some minutes, the front desk switched me to the "tower" part of the hotel. (The hotel is divided into two sections.)
reviews.title: Decent

reviews.text: There, the Internet through a cable was fine, and the hotel charged me at the lower non-tower rate. So I liked that.
reviews.title: Some rooms not great; some rooms very good. Service was very good
New Hotel but a few problems........
The Best Hotel in Maracaibo
reviews.text: The hotel was about a 30-minute drive from downtown Maraciabo. It's in a kind of isolated area.

My first room was a standard with a non-working phone, an odd odor and quite small. When the phone could not be fixed I was upgraded to a better room in the new wing without even requesting the upgrade. Venezuelan hotels are often criticized for poor service, but I thought that the desk staff and management were extremely helpful. Yes, there were minor issues-- the hot water ran out at times. But this is a nice hotel in what appeared to be a safe area. And again, the staff and management were helpful and seemed genuinely interested in providing a comfortable and nice stay. My rating for value is relatively low only because of the current exchange rate--not the fault of the hotel. The pool and gardens are beautiful.
reviews.title: If I could, I will not come back

likes.disliked: — Bathroom worn out and somewhat dirty + Small room for the price paid

description: The Crowne Plaza Maruma Hotel & Casino offers an exclusive and strategic location with immediate access to the city's financial district and is only 15 minutes away from La Chinita International Airport.
